tasks.title: Participate in a National Coding Competition
definition_of_done: Register for the competition
Complete the coding challenge
Submit the project before the deadline
tasks.micro_coaching: Focus on showcasing innovative solutions in your project to enhance your achievements lens.

tasks.title: Apply for a Technology Innovation Award
definition_of_done: Research relevant awards in technology
Prepare a project submission highlighting your Mobile App for Local Food Bank
Submit the application before the deadline
tasks.micro_coaching: Emphasize the social impact of your project to strengthen your application.

tasks.title: Create a Portfolio Website
definition_of_done: Choose a platform (e.g., GitHub Pages, WordPress)
Include sections for your projects, achievements, and contact information
Launch the website and share it with peers
tasks.micro_coaching: Highlight your achievements and projects to create a strong first impression.

tasks.title: Enroll in an Online Course on AI Ethics
definition_of_done: Select a course (e.g., Coursera, edX)
Complete all modules and assignments
Obtain a certificate upon completion
tasks.micro_coaching: This will deepen your understanding of AI ethics and enhance your research assistant role.

tasks.title: Join a Language Exchange Program
definition_of_done: Find a partner for Spanish language exchange
Schedule weekly sessions for conversation practice
Document your progress and experiences
tasks.micro_coaching: Improving your language skills will contribute to personal growth and cultural understanding.

tasks.title: Attend a Personal Development Workshop
definition_of_done: Research and select a relevant workshop
Participate actively in the sessions
Reflect on what you've learned and how to apply it
tasks.micro_coaching: Focus on workshops that enhance skills relevant to your major and personal interests.

tasks.title: Start a Blog on AI and Climate Science
definition_of_done: Choose a blogging platform
Write and publish at least three posts on your Machine Learning Wildfire Prediction System
Promote your blog on social media
tasks.micro_coaching: This will showcase your curiosity and knowledge in AI and climate science.

tasks.title: Conduct an Independent Research Project
definition_of_done: Identify a research question related to AI ethics
Gather data and analyze findings
Write a report and present your research
tasks.micro_coaching: This will enhance your research skills and curiosity in the field.

tasks.title: Attend a Tech Conference
definition_of_done: Register for a relevant conference
Network with professionals and attend workshops
Summarize key takeaways and share them with peers
tasks.micro_coaching: Engaging with industry leaders will fuel your curiosity and provide insights into future trends.

lens_improvements.improvement_opportunity: Strong but can reach 8.0+ with focused effort

tasks.title: Mentor New Robotics Team Members
definition_of_done: Develop a mentorship plan
Schedule regular check-ins with mentees
Gather feedback from mentees on your leadership
tasks.micro_coaching: This will enhance your leadership skills and impact within the team.

tasks.title: Lead a Workshop on Robotics for Younger Students
definition_of_done: Plan the workshop content and activities
Conduct the workshop and engage participants
Collect feedback and reflect on your leadership style
tasks.micro_coaching: Teaching others will solidify your leadership skills and inspire future engineers.

tasks.title: Organize a Robotics Community Event
definition_of_done: Plan the event logistics and agenda
Coordinate with team members and volunteers
Evaluate the event's success and gather participant feedback
tasks.micro_coaching: This will demonstrate your ability to lead larger initiatives and foster community engagement.

lens_improvements.improvement_opportunity: Can reach 7.0+ with additional creative projects

tasks.title: Develop a New Feature for the Mobile App
definition_of_done: Identify user needs and brainstorm new features
Design and implement the feature
Test and gather user feedback
tasks.micro_coaching: Enhancing your app will showcase your creativity and technical skills.

tasks.title: Create a Video Series on Coding Techniques
definition_of_done: Plan video topics and scripts
Record and edit the videos
Publish and promote the series online
tasks.micro_coaching: This will highlight your creativity in teaching and sharing knowledge.

tasks.title: Participate in a Creative Hackathon
definition_of_done: Register for a hackathon focused on social impact
Collaborate with a team to develop a project
Present your project and gather feedback
tasks.micro_coaching: Engaging in creative challenges will enhance your portfolio and achievements.

priority_tasks: Participate in a National Coding Competition
Enroll in an Online Course on AI Ethics
alignment_priorities.alignment_notes: High alignment. Focus on tasks that perfect alignment by emphasizing rigor and GPA.

priority_tasks: Develop a New Feature for the Mobile App
alignment_priorities.alignment_notes: High alignment. Focus on tasks that showcase creativity and leadership.

standardized_tests.rationale: Your SAT score of 1380 is in the p25-p50 range (1370-1460). Since tests are optional, you can submit but it won't significantly strengthen your application. Insufficient time (4 weeks) to retake.
